sentences.english: Yet it is only recently that we have truly turned from a whaling civilization to a whale-watching one.
sentences.chinese: 但我们真正从一种捕鲸文明转向观鲸文明还是在最近。

sentences.english: Since then, the Japanese have been instrumental in nearly wiping out the Western grey whale population.
sentences.chinese: 从那以后，日本人开始大肆捕鲸，西部灰鲸几近灭亡。

sentences.english: With industrial-scale whaling, cultural claims ring hollow.
sentences.chinese: 面对工业规模的捕鲸，人文呼吁显得苍白无力。

sentences.english: Melville incorporated in "Moby Dick" an exhaustive encyclopaedia of whaling lore .
sentences.chinese: 梅尔维尔在《白鲸》中汇集了各种捕鲸知识。

sentences.english: The whaling fleet began to fill away on a northerly course.
sentences.chinese: 捕鲸船队开始向北乘风前进。

sentences.english: Japanese whale hunters plan to capture 50 humpback whales in the Antarctic in the coming months.
sentences.chinese: 日本捕鲸者计划下月在南极捕捉50头驼背鲸。

sentences.english: Tuskarr mainly care about fishing, whaling and protecting their villages.
sentences.chinese: 图斯卡人基本上只关心捕鱼，捕鲸和保卫他们的村落。

sentences.english: Which only makes the cruelty of the killing that much more repulsive .
sentences.chinese: 只让捕鲸的残酷性更让人厌恶。

sentences.english: Brower, the grandson, still uses a heavy brass harpoon gun stamped as having been made in a very different whaling capital, New Bedford, Mass.
sentences.chinese: 这位孙子布罗尔先生还在用一根笨重的铜制捕鲸炮。

sentences.english: We are strenuously opposed to whaling and strenuously opposed to violence at sea.
sentences.chinese: 我们竭力反对捕鲸，反对海上暴力事件。

sentences.english: Populations of large baleen whales now store only 15 percent of the carbon they had before whaling.
sentences.chinese: 大长须鲸种群现在所储存的碳只有捕鲸前的15%。

sentences.english: In another series, activists go up against whaling ships.
sentences.chinese: 另一系列中，积极人士对抗捕鲸船。

sentences.english: The Pequod was a fairly small whaling ship the was sailing the next day.
sentences.chinese: 佩廓德号是一条相当小的捕鲸船，次日就要出海了。

sentences.english: They will try to interfere with or disable the Japanese whalers.
sentences.chinese: 他们将试图干扰日籍捕鲸船的行动或令其无功而返。

sentences.english: The Antarctic, however, is a different kettle offish.
sentences.chinese: 但在南极地区捕鲸却是另外一回事。

sentences.english: Is this particularly ferocious aspect of the anti-whale campaign justified?
sentences.chinese: 反捕鲸运动尤其猛烈的一方面是合理的吗？

definition: to fish for (aquatic animals and plants)/to catch
